languages.text: "Рад, что вы так считаете. Жизнь слишком коротка, чтобы тратить ее на церемонии — лучше сразу показать себя таким, каков ты есть".
"I'm glad you feel that way. Life is too short to waste it on ceremonies. It is better to present yourself as you are, immediately."
languages.original_text: "Рад, что вы так считаете. Жизнь слишком коротка, чтобы тратить ее на церемонии — лучше сразу показать себя таким, каков ты есть".

traits.locale_text: "I'm glad you feel that way. Life is too short to waste it on ceremonies, it is better to immediately present yourself as you are."
"I'm glad you feel that way. Life is too short to waste it on ceremonies, it is better to immediately present yourself as you are."
"I'm glad you feel that way. Life is too short to waste it on ceremonies. It is better to present yourself as you are, immediately."
"I'm glad you feel that way. Life is too short to waste it on ceremonies. It is better to present yourself as you are, immediately."
"I'm glad you feel that way. Life is too short to waste it on ceremonies. It is better to present yourself as you are, immediately."
"I'm glad you feel that way. Life is too short to waste it on ceremonies. It is better to present yourself as you are, immediately."

languages.text: « Voilà qui fait plaisir à entendre. La vie est trop courte pour perdre son temps à faire des courbettes. Alors, autant se présenter tel qu'on est dès le début, sans faire de manières. »
languages.original_text: "I'm glad you feel that way. Life is too short to waste it on ceremonies. It is better to present yourself as you are, immediately."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà qui fait plaisir à entendre. La vie est trop courte pour perdre son temps à faire des courbettes. Alors, autant se présenter tel qu'on est dès le début, sans faire de manières. »

languages.text: «Me alegra que tenga esa opinión. La vida es muy corta para malgastarla con ceremonias. Es mejor presentarse tal y como es uno, directamente».
languages.original_text: "I'm glad you feel that way. Life is too short to waste it on ceremonies. It is better to present yourself as you are, immediately."

traits.locale_text: «Me alegra que tenga esa opinión. La vida es muy corta para malgastarla con ceremonias. Es mejor presentarse tal y como es uno, directamente».

languages.text: “很高兴您也能这么想。毕竟生命太短暂，不能浪费在那些繁文缛节上。人嘛，只要坦坦荡荡地活着就好。”
languages.original_text: "I'm glad you feel that way. Life is too short to waste it on ceremonies. It is better to present yourself as you are, immediately."

traits.locale_text: “很高兴您也能这么想。毕竟生命太短暂，不能浪费在那些繁文缛节上。人嘛，只要坦坦荡荡地活着就好。”

languages.text: 「お前がそう思ってくれて嬉しいよ。儀式に時間を費やすには、人生は短すぎる。最初からありのままの自分を見せたほうがいい」
languages.original_text: "I'm glad you feel that way. Life is too short to waste it on ceremonies. It is better to present yourself as you are, immediately."

traits.locale_text: 「お前がそう思ってくれて嬉しいよ。儀式に時間を費やすには、人生は短すぎる。最初からありのままの自分を見せたほうがいい」

languages.text: "Freut mich, dass Ihr das so seht. Das Leben ist zu kurz, um es auf Zeremonien zu vergeuden. Es ist besser, sich unverzüglich so zu präsentieren, wie man ist."
languages.original_text: "I'm glad you feel that way. Life is too short to waste it on ceremonies. It is better to present yourself as you are, immediately."

traits.locale_text: "Freut mich, dass Ihr das so seht. Das Leben ist zu kurz, um es auf Zeremonien zu vergeuden. Es ist besser, sich unverzüglich so zu präsentieren, wie man ist."

string_traits.trait: Встраивание генокрадов и офицеров в мейнсюжет (Зауэрбэк + Инфернус)
